name: CATastrophe (Loki+LPunicorn, Chaxs, Ninsn, Synixxen, MagicalElf)
description:
Sweet grandma left the house! And what do kittens do when they are alone at their new home? Cause CATastrophes.

Play as Randle, a kitten alone at home. Discovering your new surroundings with only destruction on your mind. While grandma is away, your only goal is to destroy as many things in the house as you can.

 Throw stuff off the cabinets, sharpen your claws on nearby pictures  or the whole interior itself, but don't forget the Zoomies!

Controls: Keyboard:

 Walk:         

 Jump:       

Interact:       

Meow:        

Pause:        

Controller:

Walk:       

Jump:     

Interact:     

Meow:     

Pause:      

Features:

Full Controller Support

Push

Scratch

Sleep

Mlem

and

ZOOMIES

How to install:

1: Download

2: Unpack

3: Start Game

4: Riot and Zoomies

Credits:

Lukas: Programmer

This is a submission to the htk Gamejam Ice Edition 2022
